rev.comment: /* F-15 Eagle */ unnecessary fair use here; there's a link to the article where a picture of the toy is shown
rev.diff:
Line 468: Line 468:
==F-15 Eagle==
==F-15 Eagle==
â
[[File:f15s-transformers.jpg|thumb|right|The ''Transformers'' characters [[Thundercracker]], [[Skywarp]] and [[Starscream (Transformers)|Starscream]] as F-15 Eagle jets in a [[Marvel Comics]] story]]
  â  
The [[McDonnell Douglas F-15 Eagle]] is one of the most recognized modern fighters; this has led to, or perhaps even been aided by, its common use in children's toys. The Transformers toy line and media has featured numerous characters who turn into F-15 Eagles, the most notable being the villain [[Starscream (Transformers)|Starscream]] in 1984<ref name="Time30Jul01">{{cite news|url =http://www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,1000438,00.html|title= Action Figures From The '80s|accessdate= 2009-12-09|last= Briese|first= Beau|authorlink= |year= 2001|month= July | work=Time}}</ref> and a group of similar Decepticons, the [[Seekers (Transformers)|Seekers]] [[Acid Storm]], [[Thundercracker]], [[Skywarp]] and [[Sunstorm (Transformers)|Sunstorm]]. Although completely unrelated design to the others, the Autobot Air Raid also disguises himself as an F-15.<ref>Transformers Identification and Price Guide by Mark Bellomo, 2007, p. 85</ref>
The [[McDonnell Douglas F-15 Eagle]] is one of the most recognized modern fighters; this has led to, or perhaps even been aided by, its common use in children's toys. The Transformers toy line and media has featured numerous characters who turn into F-15 Eagles, the most notable being the villain [[Starscream (Transformers)|Starscream]] in 1984<ref name="Time30Jul01">{{cite news|url =http://www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,1000438,00.html|title= Action Figures From The '80s|accessdate= 2009-12-09|last= Briese|first= Beau|authorlink= |year= 2001|month= July | work=Time}}</ref> and a group of similar Decepticons, the [[Seekers (Transformers)|Seekers]] [[Acid Storm]], [[Thundercracker]], [[Skywarp]] and [[Sunstorm (Transformers)|Sunstorm]]. Although completely unrelated design to the others, the Autobot Air Raid also disguises himself as an F-15.<ref>Transformers Identification and Price Guide by Mark Bellomo, 2007, p. 85</ref>
